sqlMap.update: update gpsRealData set plateNo = #plateNo#, online=#online#,location=#location#, simNo= #simNo#, sendTime= #sendTime#, longitude=#longitude#,latitude=#latitude#, velocity=#velocity#,direction=#direction#, status=#status#, mileage= #mileage#, gas=#gas#,recordVelocity=#recordVelocity#, updateDate=#updateDate#, alarmState= #alarmState#, altitude= #altitude#,valid=#valid#, enclosureAlarm = #enclosureAlarm#, enclosureType = #enclosureType#, enclosureId = #enclosureId# , overSpeedAreaId = #overSpeedAreaId#, overSpeedAreaType = #overSpeedAreaType#, runTimeOnRoute = #runTimeOnRoute#, routeSegmentId = #routeSegmentId# , routeAlarmType = #routeAlarmType# where vehicleId = #vehicleId#
sqlMap.statement: CREATE TABLE gps_hisData.dbo.$tableName$ ( [gpsId] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [simNo] [nvarchar](12) NULL, [plateNo] [nvarchar](10) NULL, [commandId] [int] NULL, [sendTime] [datetime] NULL, [longitude] [numeric](18, 6) NULL, [latitude] [numeric](18, 6) NULL, [velocity] [numeric](18, 1) NULL, [direction] [int] NULL, [status] [int] NULL, [mileage] [numeric](18, 1) NULL, [gas] [numeric](18, 1) NULL, [recordVelocity] [numeric](18, 1) NULL, [location] [nvarchar](100) NULL, [createDate] [datetime] NULL, [tenantId] [int] NULL, [deleted] [bit] NULL, [remark] [nvarchar](50) NULL, [owner] [nvarchar](50) NULL, [alarmState] [int] NULL, [altitude] [numeric](18, 1) NULL, [valid] [bit] NULL, [runStatus] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [signal] [int] NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]

CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_$tableName$] ON gps_hisData.dbo.$tableName$ ( [plateNo] ASC, [sendTime] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]

CREATE TABLE gps_hisData.dbo.$tableName$ ( [id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [plateNo] [nvarchar](50) NULL, [vehicleId] [int] NULL, [alarmType] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [alarmSource] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [createDate] [datetime] NULL, [alarmTime] [datetime] NULL, [processed] [int] NULL, [latitude] [float] NULL, [longitude] [float] NULL, [speed] [numeric](10, 2) NULL, [location] [nvarchar](80) NULL, [deleted] [bit] NULL, [tenantId] [int] NULL, [remark] [nvarchar](50) NULL, [owner] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [ackSn] [int] NULL, [descr] [nvarchar](50) NULL, [processedTime] [datetime] NULL, [processedUserId] [int] NULL, [processedUserName] [nvarchar](50) NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]
sqlMap.select: SELECT [name] FROM gps_hisdata.sys.tables WHERE [name] = #tableName#

select row_number() over( order by v.plateNo ) as RowNum, v.*, d.name as depName1, r.driverName,r.driverId, m.name as memberName, e.fullName as regionName, i.description as industryTypeName ,t.name as vehicleTypeName , tm.termNo from vehicle v left join MemberInfo m on v.memberId = m.id left join (select top 1 driverId,driverName, vehicleId from driverInfo where vehicleId = #vehicleId# ) r on v.vehicleId = r.vehicleId left join department d on v.depId = d.depId left join region e on e.code = v.region left join industryType i on i.code = v.industry left join vehicleType t on t.code = v.vehicleType left join terminal tm on tm.termId = v.termId where v.deleted = 0
(v.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(v.depId = #depId#)
(v.simNo like '%$simNo$%')
(v.vendor like '%$vendor$%')
(v.vehicleId = #vehicleId#)
(r.driverName like '%$driverName$%')
(v.runStatus = #runStatus#)
not exists (select 1 from EnclosureBinding where enclosureId = #enclosureId# and vehicleId = v.vehicleId)
select v.vehicleId, v.plateNo,g.mileage, g.gas from vehicle v left join gpsrealdata g on v.vehicleId = g.vehicleId where v.deleted = 0

select vehicleId as code, plateNo as name from vehicle v , department d where v.deleted = 0 and v.depId = d.depId
(plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(v.depId = #depId#)
(v.vehicleId = #vehicleId#)
(simNo like '%$simNo$%')
order by v.plateNo

select b.bindId,b.enclosureId,r.simNo from EnclosureBinding b, GPSRealData r where r.vehicleId = b.vehicleId and b.bindType = 'platform'
r.sendTime >= #onlineDate#

select row_number() over( order by v.plateNo ) as RowNum, v.*, d.name as depName1 from vehicle v , department d, EnclosureBinding b where v.deleted = 0 and v.depId = d.depId and v.vehicleId = b.vehicleId
(plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(v.depId = #depId#)
(b.enclosureId = #enclosureId#)
(simNo like '%$simNo$%')

select row_number() over( order by v.plateNo ) as RowNum, v.*, d.name as depName1,g.sendTime, (case when g.online = 1 then '在线' else '离线' end) as online, r.driverId, r.driverName, (case when g.online = 1 then 0 when g.sendTime is null then 0 else (datediff(second, sendTime, getdate()) * 0.1 / 60) end ) as offlineTimeSpan, m.name as memberName ,e.fullName as regionName, i.description as industryType ,t.name as vehicleTypeName from vehicle v left join gpsRealData g on v.vehicleId = g.vehicleId left join MemberInfo m on v.memberId = m.id left join DriverInfo r on v.vehicleId = r.vehicleId left join department d on v.depId = d.depId left join region e on e.code = v.region left join industryType i on i.code = v.industry left join vehicleType t on t.code = v.vehicleType
(v.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(v.depId = #depId#)
(v.simNo like '%$simNo$%')
(g.online = 1)
(g.online <> 1)

select v.vehicleId, v.plateNo, v.depId, g.velocity, v.simNo, g.online, d.driverName from vehicle v left join GpsRealData g on v.vehicleId = g.vehicleId left join driverInfo d on v.vehicleId = d.vehicleId where v.deleted = 0
(v.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(v.depId = #depId#)
(v.simNo like '%$simNo$%')
(v.status = #status#)
v.depId in (
#depIdList[]#
)

select row_number() over( order by u.loginName ) as RowNum, u.*, role.name as roleName from userInfo u , (select r.name, ur.userId, r.roleId from role r , userrole ur where r.roleId=ur.roleId) role where u.deleted = 0 and u.userId = role.userId
(u.loginName like '%$loginName$%')
(u.userState = #userState#)
(role.roleId = #roleId#)

select row_number() over(order by a.name) as RowNum, a.*, b.name as parentDepName from department a left join department b on a.parentId = b.depId where a.deleted = 0
(a.name like '%$name$%')
(a.memNo = #memNo#)

select row_number() over(order by a.name) as RowNum, a.* from memberInfo a where a.deleted = 0
(a.name = #name#)
(a.memNo = #memNo#)
select a.name, a.id as code from memberInfo a where a.deleted = 0

select row_number() over(order by sn) as RowNum, * from basicData a where deleted = 0
(a.parent = #parent#)

select row_number() over(order by a.sn) as RowNum, a.*, b.name as infoMenuType from basicData a , (select baseId,name,code from basicData where parent = 'InfoMenu') b where a.deleted = 0 and a.parent = 'Information' and a.code = b.code
(a.code = #code#)
select depId as code, name from department where deleted = 0 order by parentId

select row_number() over(order by name) as RowNum,* from role where deleted = 0
(name like '%$name$%')
select roleId as code, name from role where deleted = 0

select v.vehicleId,v.plateNo, v.simNo, g.*,d.name as depName, v.plateColor,r.driverId, r.driverName, m.name as memberName , v.memberId, v.region, e.fullName as regionName, i.description as industryType ,t.name as vehicleType , eb.eContent as ewayBill from vehicle v left join gpsRealData g on v.vehicleId = g.vehicleId left join MemberInfo m on v.memberId = m.id left join DriverInfo r on v.vehicleId = r.vehicleId left join department d on v.depId = d.depId left join region e on e.code = v.region left join industryType i on i.code = v.industry left join vehicleType t on t.code = v.vehicleType left join ewayBill eb on eb.vehicleId = v.vehicleId
(v.vehicleId = #vehicleId#)
(v.plateNo = #plateNo#)
v.depId in (
#depIdList[]#
)

select v.vehicleId,v.plateNo, v.simNo, d.name as depName, v.plateColor,r.driverId, r.driverName, m.name as memberName , v.memberId, v.region, e.fullName as regionName, i.description as industryType ,t.name as vehicleType , eb.eContent as ewayBill from vehicle v left join MemberInfo m on v.memberId = m.id left join DriverInfo r on v.vehicleId = r.vehicleId left join department d on v.depId = d.depId left join region e on e.code = v.region left join industryType i on i.code = v.industry left join vehicleType t on t.code = v.vehicleType left join ewayBill eb on eb.vehicleId = v.vehicleId
(v.vehicleId = #vehicleId#)

select row_number() over(order by g.plateNo) as RowNum, g.*, d.name as depName, v.plateColor from gpsRealData g , vehicle v , department d where g.vehicleId = v.vehicleId and v.depId = d.depId
(g.vehicleId = #vehicleId#)
g.vehicleId in (
#vehicleIdList[]#
)
( latitude <= #maxLatitude# and latitude >= #minLatitude# and longitude <= #maxLongitude# and longitude >= #minLongitude# )

select row_number() over(order by o.createDate desc) as RowNum,o.*,b.name as operationDescr from OperationLog o left join basicData b on o.detail = b.code where b.parent = 'Operation' and o.detail <> 'operationLog.action'
(o.userName = #userName#)
o.createDate >= #startDate#
o.createDate <= dateadd(day,1, #endDate#)

select row_number() over(order by t.createDate desc) as RowNum,t.*, v.plateColor from TerminalCommand t left join vehicle v on t.simNo = v.simNo
(t.userId = #userId#)
(t.owner = #owner#)
(t.simNo like '%$simNo$%')
(t.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
t.createDate >= #startDate#
t.cmdType = 33536
t.createDate <= dateadd(day,1, #endDate#)

select row_number() over(order by createDate desc) as RowNum,* from JT809Command
createDate >= #createDate#
(source = #source#)

select row_number() over(order by w.createDate desc) as RowNum,w.* from WarnMsgUrgTodoReq w
w.createDate >= #createDate#

select (u.name + '['+b.name+']') as name, enclosureId as code from enclosure u, basicData b where u.deleted = 0 and u.enclosureType = b.code and b.parent = 'EnclosureType'
exists (select 1 from EnclosureBinding c where c.enclosureId = u.enclosureId and c.platform = 1 and c.vehicleId = #vehicleId#)

select row_number() over( order by u.createDate ) as RowNum, * from enclosure u where deleted = 0
(u.name like '%$name$%')
(u.enclosureType = #enclosureType#)
(u.enclosureType <> #excludeRoute#)
not exists (select 1 from EnclosureBinding where enclosureId = u.enclosureId and platform = 1 and vehicleId = #vehicleId#)

select row_number() over( order by u.createDate ) as RowNum, u.*, et.configType, et.status as commandStatus, et.updateDate from enclosure u left join (select e.*, t.status, t.updateDate from EnclosureBinding e, terminalCommand t where e.commandId = t.cmdId and e.vehicleId = #vehicleId# and e.terminal=1) et on et.enclosureId = u.enclosureId where u.deleted = 0
(u.name like '%$name$%')
(u.enclosureType = #enclosureType#)
( et.status is null or et.status <> 'Success')
et.status = 'Success'
(u.enclosureType <> #excludeRoute#)

select row_number() over( order by u.createDate ) as RowNum, u.*, v.plateNo from driverInfo u left join vehicle v on u.vehicleId = v.vehicleId
(u.driverName like '%$name$%')
(u.identityCard like '%$identityCard$%')
(u.driverId = #driverId#)
(u.vehicleId = #vehicleId#)

select row_number() over(order by t.createDate desc) as RowNum, t.*,v.plateNo from terminal t left join vehicle v on t.termid = v.termId where t.deleted = 0
(t.termNo like '%$termNo$%')
(t.devNo like '%$devNo$%')
(t.simNo like '%$simNo$%')
t.bind = #bind#
state = #state#
select termId as code, termNo as name from terminal where ( bind = 0 or termId = #termId# ) and deleted = 0
select id, parent_Code as pId, industry_type as name, 'true' as [open] from industryType order by id
select id, parent as pId, name, 'false' as [open] from region order by id
select id, parentCode as pId, name, 'false' as [open] from vehicleType order by id
select depId as code, name from department where deleted = 0

select row_number() over(order by a.createDate desc) as RowNum,a.cmd, a.cmdData, a.createDate, v.plateColor,v.simNo,v.plateNo ,d.name as depName from vehicleRecorder a, vehicle v , department d where a.vehicleId = v.vehicleId and v.depId = d.depId
(a.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(a.createDate >= #startTime#)
(a.createDate <= #endTime#)
(a.cmd = #cmdWord#)
(a.commandId = #commandId#)
(v.depId = #depId#)

select row_number() over(order by a.createDate desc) as RowNum,a.*,a.alarmTime as startTime, v.plateColor,v.simNo,d.name as depName,v.depId from newAlarm a, vehicle v , department d where a.vehicleId = v.vehicleId and v.depId = d.depId
(a.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(a.createDate >= #startTime#)
(a.createDate <= #endTime#)
(a.alarmType = #alarmType#)
(a.processed = #processed#)
(v.depId = #depId#)

select row_number() over(order by startTime desc) as RowNum,a.*, v.plateColor,v.simNo,d.name as depName from alarmRecord a, vehicle v , department d where a.plateNo = v.plateNo and v.depId = d.depId and a.type <> 'terminal_state'
(a.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(startTime >= #startTime#)
(startTime <= #endTime#)
(a.childType = #childType#)
(a.type = #alarmSource#)
(a.status = #status#)
(a.station = #enclosureId#)
(a.processed = #processed#)
(v.depId = #depId#)
(a.childType = 'GpsOnline' or a.childType = 'GpsOffline')

select row_number() over(order by a.createDate desc) as RowNum,a.*,a.alarmTime as startTime, v.plateColor,v.simNo,d.name as depName from newAlarm a, vehicle v , department d where a.vehicleId = v.vehicleId and v.depId = d.depId
(a.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(alarmTime >= #startTime#)
(alarmTime <= #endTime#)
(a.alarmType = #alarmType#)
(a.processed = #processed#)
(v.depId = #depId#)

select row_number() over(order by sendTime) as RowNum,a.* from gpsInfo a
a.plateNo = #plateNo#
(sendTime >= #startTime#)
(sendTime <= #endTime#)
(a.status = #status#)
(a.valid = 1)
(a.velocity >= #minSpeed#)
(a.velocity <= #maxSpeed#)

select row_number() over(order by sendTime) as RowNum,a.*, d.name as depName, v.plateColor from gpsInfo a, vehicle v, department d where a.plateNo = v.plateNo and v.depId = d.depId
v.vehicleId = #vehicleId#
v.plateNo = #plateNo#
(a.sendTime >= #startTime#)
(a.sendTime <= #endTime#)
(a.status = #status#)
v.depId = #depId#

select a.plateNo, a.latitude, a.longitude, a.sendTime from gpsInfo a
(sendTime >= #startTime#)
(sendTime <= #endTime#)
( latitude <= #maxLatitude# and latitude >= #minLatitude# and longitude <= #maxLongitude# and longitude >= #minLongitude# )
select v.DepId, sum(case a.Online when 1 then 1 else 0 end) OnlineNum, count(1) VehicleNum from Vehicle v left join GpsRealData a on v.PlateNo = a.PlateNo where v.Deleted = 0 group by v.DepId

select row_number() over ( order by f.PlateNo ) as RowNum, f.*, d.Name as depName from VehicleOnlineRate f , Vehicle v, Department d where f.PlateNo = v.PlateNo and v.DepId = d.DepId
StaticDate >= #startDate#
StaticDate <= dateadd(day,1, #endDate#)
V.PlateNo like '%$plateNo$%'
v.DepId = #depId#
f.IntervalType = #intervalType#
v.DepId in
#depList[]#

select row_number() over (order by v.PlateNo) as RowNum, v.plateNo, v.plateColor, v.depId, d.name as depName , (case when vr.ts is null then 0 else (vr.ts * 0.1 / 6 ) end )as onlineTime, (timeSpan * 0.1 / 6) as totalTime, (case when vr.ts is null then timespan else (timeSpan - vr.ts) end)* 0.1 / 6 as offlineTime, (case when timeSpan = 0 then 0 when vr.ts is null then 0 else round((vr.ts * 100.00/ timeSpan),2) end) as onlineRate from (select plateNo, plateColor, depId, datediff(second, #startDate#,#endDate#) as timeSpan from vehicle ) v left join (select plateNO, sum(datediff(second,(case when startTime >= #startDate# then startTime else #startDate# end), (case when status = 'New' then getdate() when endTime <= #endDate# then endTime else #endDate# end))) as ts from alarmRecord where endTime >= #startDate# and startTime <= #endDate# and childType = 'GpsOnline' group by plateNo ) vr on v.plateNo = vr.plateNo left join department d on v.depId = d.depId
V.PlateNo like '%$plateNo$%'
v.DepId = #depId#
v.DepId in
#depList[]#

select row_number() over ( order by f.staticDate desc ) as RowNum, f.*, d.Name as depName,v.plateColor from FuelConsumption f , Vehicle v, Department d where f.PlateNo = v.PlateNo and v.DepId = d.DepId
StaticDate >= #startDate#
StaticDate <= dateadd(day,1, #endDate#)
V.PlateNo like '%$plateNo$%'
v.DepId = #depId#
f.IntervalType = #intervalType#
v.DepId in
#depList[]#

select row_number() over( order by v.plateNo ) as RowNum, v.plateNo, v.plateColor, d.name as depName, f.staticDate, ISNULL(f.alarmTimes , 0) as alarmTimes, f.alarmType from Vehicle v left join (select plateNo, max(a.alarmTime) staticDate, count(1) alarmTimes, alarmType from newAlarm a
a.alarmTime >= #startDate#
a.alarmTime <= dateadd(day,1, #endDate#)
a.PlateNo like '%$plateNo$%'
a.alarmType in
#alarmTypeList[]#
group by a.PlateNo , a.alarmType ) f on v.plateNo = f.plateNo, Department d where v.DepId = d.DepId
v.DepId = #depId#
V.PlateNo like '%$plateNo$%'
v.depId in (
#depIdList[]#
)

select row_number() over( order by f.plateNo ) as RowNum, v.plateNo, v.plateColor, sum(f.Mileage) mileage, sum(f.gas) gas,min(d.Name) as depName, 0 as ID, 3 as IntervalType, max(staticDate) as staticDate from FuelConsumption f , Vehicle v, Department d where f.PlateNo = v.PlateNo and v.DepId = d.DepId and f.intervalType = 0
StaticDate >= #startDate#
StaticDate <= dateadd(day,1, #endDate#)
V.PlateNo like '%$plateNo$%'
v.DepId in
#depList[]#
group by f.PlateNo

select row_number() over( order by v.statisticDate desc ) as RowNum, d.name as depName, onlineNum, vehicleNum, (vehicleNum - onlineNum) as offlineNum , v.onlineRate , v.statisticDate from onlineStatic v , department d where v.depId = d.depId
(v.depId = #depId#)
(statisticDate >= #startDate#)
(statisticDate <= #endDate#)

select row_number() over( order by m.sendTime desc ) as RowNum, m.*, d.name as depName,v.plateNo as plateNo1, v.plateColor from MediaItem m , Vehicle V , Department d where m.simNo = v.simNo and v.Deleted = 0 and v.DepId = d.DepId
m.SendTime >= #startDate#
m.SendTime <= #endDate#
v.DepId in
#depList[]#
V.DepId = #depId#
m.codeFormat = #codeFormat#
m.mediaType = #mediaType#
V.PlateNo like '%$PlateNo$%'
V.SimNo like '%$simNo$%'
